subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dustin Brown and Trevor Lewis scored 22 seconds apart for Los Angeles, which turned a 3-2 deficit into a 4-3 victory and took a 2-0 series lead.
snippet: Dustin Brown and Trevor Lewis scored 22 seconds apart for Los Angeles, which turned a 3-2 deficit into a 4-3 victory and took a 2-0 series lead.
